title: Menu wo Douzo: Here’s the Menu - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Cooking   Female Protagonist   Magic   Monsters   Restaurant   Transported to Another World
author: Hina   Shiomura Hina   雛／汐邑雛
description:
“Urgent recruitment. Why don’t you try working as a chef at a scenic resort area?”

Maejima Shiori, who was at the bottom of her life, where even Tenchuusatsu and Daisakkai 1 added together would be too weak, was attracted to that kind of catch copy and chose a new job.

Her new workplace was a restaurant in a state-owned hotel.

She met people overflowing with individual characteristic, gradually became familiar with the area, used unfamiliar food ingredients, Shiori created dishes that did not exist in this area.>
